blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

summary: Arachnae
title: Arachnae
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HlKtIV

by rowan_reign

Outside of government intelligence agencies, two organizations have risen to fill the demand for private, third-party intelligence operations. Both have highly trained covert operatives at their disposal, and both are constantly trying to out-maneuver one another.

On one side: Wade Wilson and Clint Barton, the cleanup crew for S.H.I.E.L.D. missions that don’t necessarily need to be done right, but do need to be done thoroughly.

On the other: Peter Parker and Natasha Romanov, the Huntsman and Black Widow, the Arachnae Organization’s most venomous agents.

And between them: a web of secrets, lies, and hidden truths that might just unravel them all.

Words: 3787, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Nick Fury, Original Male Character(s)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Spies, Comics compliant characterization, Deaf Character, bad choices, spies are cool, Wade is Not Not Deadpool, Peter Parker Doesn’t Kill People, Implied/Referenced Past Torture, Torture, Implied/Referenced Past Child Abuse, Red Rooms are Messed Up


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HlKtIV

tags: it's been years since the first avengers and i still can't believe wheadon pulled that shit
but pietro is a whole other story
summary: In less than 24 hours I got more annoyed than anything of this “But Clint is married! They are not going to delete his family...
body:
In less than 24 hours I got more annoyed than anything of this “But Clint is married! They are not going to delete his family out of existence!” shit some people are pulling in the notes of basically any Clintasha post.

Yes he is married. Yes he has kids. 

We all know that.

We also all know that was a shit move put on Age of Ultron by Whedon (and Ruffalo who wanted Bruce and Nat) who somehow thought it was a good idea to give Clint Barton a wife and some kids and who thought people were going to buy it after the first Avengers pulled on this

and this

and this

and this

and this

and this

and this

and this

and this

and this

thank you Loki

Loki knew things

and whatever the hell happened in Budapest

okay this might have jus been him teasing

And then they pulled that whole arrow necklace thing in Winter Soldier

(x)

And then what the hell was this back in Age of Ultron, before we knew about the wife and the kids?

The media tour after the first Avengers

(x)

And then after Age of Ultron Renner himself admited he was confused about Clint having a wife. And he was asked this BY A KID.

(post // video)

The point is, EVERYONE, including the actors, know and recognise the fact that the Barton family and the Brucenat thing was a whole clusterfuck of mistakes. A plot that came out of nowhere, was confusing as fuck and din’t make any sense considering the (many) previous events and the timeline.

Hawkeye didn’t had a personal story in the first Avengers, before AoU, everytime we heard about him/saw him, he was on the field, fighting. And then out of the blue came a wife and some kids.

Shit mistake.

Big mistake.

No one, inddeed, saw that coming. Cuase we didn’t had to thing about that. Cause it wasn’t even hinted before, thhahe could have a wife and kids and a whole other (personal) life, hidden in the prairie (or whatever the hell that house was).

Legit reaction to everything:

(never found myself in Steve and Thor than in this moment)

This is that one mistake they all recognise and it wouldn’t surprise me if by going back in time, and changing the timeline, this is one of the things the Russos are going to actually fix.

Will it be messy? Yes, probably, but not more than it already is. And it’s Marvel we are talking about. They deal with messy.



(And besides, they killed off Pietro who could have been more important to the MCU than Laura Barton after one movie. I don’t know why you all act like she’d survive Endgame anyway #ForeverBitterAboutPietro)

I’m not sure how I feel about this…

blog.description: Daniel age 21

summary:
But guys could you imagine Percy in the MCU after Thanos snap? Especially if Annabeth and his family disappeared? 
I'm pretty...
body:
But guys could you imagine Percy in the MCU after Thanos snap? Especially if Annabeth and his family disappeared?

I’m pretty sure by the time the avengers get their shit together and ready to face Thanos, Percy would have killed him, and planning to kill the gods afterwards for letting this happen.

All the avengers would be speechless and shocked that a 17 year old could kill Thanos, except probably Thor who’d be fangirling meeting Percy.
